GSP29antarkpu:0: AnTs_1ab nidhāya hṛdi viśveśaṃ vidhāya guruvandanam /
GSP29antarkpu:6: AnTs_6 param aparaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ sāmānyam //
GSP29antarkpu:7: AnTs_7 nityadravyavṛttayo viśeṣās tv anantā eva //
GSP29antarkpu:9: AnTs_9 abhāvaś caturvidhaḥ / prāgabhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvo 'tyantābhāvo 'nyonyābhāvaś ceti //
GSP29antarkpu:10_0: AnTs_10 gandhavatī pṛthivī / sā dvividhā nityānityā ca / nityā paramāṇurūpā / anityā
GSP29antarkpu:10_1: kāryarūpā / punas trividhā śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīram asmadādīnām / indriyaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:11_0: AnTs_11 śitasparśavatya āpaḥ / tā dvividhāḥ nityā anityāś ca / ntyāḥ paramāṇurūpāḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:11_1: anityāḥ kāryarūpāḥ. / punas trividhāḥ. śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīraṃ varuṇaloke /
GSP29antarkpu:11_2: indriyaṃ rasagrāhakaṃ rasanaṃ jihvāgravarti / viṣayaḥ saritsamudrādiḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:12_0: AnTs_12 uṣṇasparśavat tejaḥ / tad dvividhaṃ nityam anityaṃ ca / niyyaṃ paramāṇurūpam /
GSP29antarkpu:12_1: anityaṃ kāryarūpam / punas trividhaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīram ādityaloke /
GSP29antarkpu:12_2: indriyaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇatārāgravarti / viṣayaś caturvidhaḥ / bhaumadivyaudaryākarajabhedāt /
GSP29antarkpu:12_3: bhaumaṃ vahnyādikam / abindhanaṃ divyaṃ vidyudādi / bhuktasya pariṇāmahetur audaryam.
GSP29antarkpu:13_0: AnTs_13 rūparahitasparśavān vāyuḥ / sa dvividho nityo 'nityaś ca / nityaḥ paramāṇurūpaḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:13_1: anityaḥ kāryarūpaḥ / punas trividhaḥ śarīrendriyaviṣayabhedāt / śarīraṃ vāyuloke /
GSP29antarkpu:13_2: indriyaṃ sparśagrāhakaṃ tvaksarvaśarīravarti / viṣayo vṛkṣādikampanahetuḥ // śarīrāntaḥsaṃcārī
GSP29antarkpu:13_3: vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ / sa caiko 'py upādhibhedāt prāṇāpānādisaṃjñā labhate //
GSP29antarkpu:14: AnTs_14 śabdaguṇam ākāśam / tac caikaṃ vibhu nityaṃ ca //
GSP29antarkpu:15: AnTs_15 atītādivyavahārahetuḥ kālaḥ / sa caiko vibhur nityaś ca //
GSP29antarkpu:16: AnTs_16 prācyādivyavahārahetur dik / sā caikā vibhvī nityā ca //
GSP29antarkpu:17: AnTs_17 jñānādhikaraṇam ātmā / sa dvividhaḥ paramātmā jīvātmā ca / tatreśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ paramātmaika eva / jīvātmā pratiśarīraṃ bhinno vibhur nityaś ca //
GSP29antarkpu:18: AnTs_18 sukhādyupalabdhisādhanam indriyaṃ manaḥ / tac ca pratyātmaniyatatvād anantaṃ paramāṇurūpaṃ nityaṃ ca //
GSP29antarkpu:19_0: AnTs_19 cakṣurmātragrāhyo guṇo rūpam / tac ca śuklanīlapītaraktaharitakapiśacitrabhedāt
GSP29antarkpu:19_1: saptavidhaṃ pṛthivījalatejovṛtti / tatra pṛthivyāṃ saptavidham / abhāsvaraśuklaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:20: AnTs_20 rasanagrāhyo guṇo rasaḥ / sa ca madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyatiktabhedāt ṣaḍvidhaḥ / pṛthivyāṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ / jale madhura eva //
GSP29antarkpu:21: AnTs_21 ghrāṇagrāhyo guṇo gandhaḥ / sa ca dvividhaḥ surabhirasurabhiś ca / pṛthivīmātravṛttiḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:22: AnTs_22 tvagindriyamātragrāhyo guṇo saparśaḥ / sa ca trividhaḥ śitoṣṇānuṣṇāśītabhedāt / pṛthivyaptejovāyuvṛttiḥ / tatra śīto jale / uṣṇas tejasi / anuṣṇāśītaḥ pṛthivīvāyvoḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:23: AnTs_23 rūpādicatuṣṭayaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pākajam anityaṃ ca / anyatrāpākajaṃ nityam antyaṃ ca / nityagataṃ nityam / anityagatam anityam //
GSP29antarkpu:24_1: ekatvaṃ nityam anityaṃ ca / nityagataṃ nityam anityagatam anityam / dvitvādikaṃ tu
GSP29antarkpu:25: AnTs_25 mānavyavahārakāraṇaṃ parimāṇaṃ / navadravyavṛtti / tac caturvidham / aṇu mahad dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti //
GSP29antarkpu:29_1: te dvividhe dikkṛte kālakṛte ca / dūrasthe dikkṛtaṃ paratvam / samīpasthe dikkṛtam
GSP29antarkpu:29_2: aparatvam / jyeṣṭhe kālakṛthaṃ paratvam / kaniṣṭhe kālakṛtam aparatvam //
GSP29antarkpu:31_0: AnTs_31 ādyasyandanāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ dravatvaṃ pṛthivyaptejovṛtti / tad dvividhaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:31_1: sāṃsiddhikaṃ naimittikaṃ ca / sāṃsiddhikaṃ jale naimittikaṃ pṛthivītejasoḥ / pṛthivyāṃ
GSP29antarkpu:33: AnTs_33 śrotragrāhyo guṇaḥ śabdaḥ / ākāśamātravṛttiḥ / sa dvividho dvanyātmako varṇātmakaś ceti / dvanyātmako bheryādau / varṇātmakaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣādirūpaḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:34: AnTs_34 sarvavyavahārahetur buddhir jñānam / sā dvividhā smṛtiranubhavaś ca / saṃskāramātrajanyaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ / tadbhinnaṃ jñānam anubhavaḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:35_0: AnTs_35 sa dvividho yathārtho 'yathārthaś ca / tadvati tatprakārako 'nubhavo yathārthaḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:35_1: yathā rajata idaṃ rajatam iti jñānam / sa eva pramety ucyate / tadabhāvavati tatprakārako
GSP29antarkpu:35_2: 'nubhavo 'yathārthaḥ / yathā śuktāv idaṃ rajatam iti jñānam //
GSP29antarkpu:36: AnTs_36 yathārthānubhavaś caturvidhaḥ pratyakṣānumityupamitiśabdabhedāt / tatkaraṇam api caturvidhaṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdabhedāt //
GSP29antarkpu:40_0: AnTs_40 kāraṇaṃ trividhaṃ samavāyyasamavāyinimittabhedāt / yat samavetaṃ kāryam utpadyate
GSP29antarkpu:40_1: tat samavāyikāraṇam / yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya paṭaś ca khagatarūpādeḥ / kāryeṇa kāraṇena
GSP29antarkpu:40_2: vā sahaikasminn arthe samavetatve sati yat kāraṇaṃ tad asamavāyikāraṇam / yathā tantusaṃyogaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:40_3: paṭasya tanturūpaṃ paṭarūpasya / tadubhayabhinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ nimittakāraṇam / yathā
GSP29antarkpu:41: AnTs_41 tad etattrividhakāraṇamadhye yad asādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tad eva karaṇam //
GSP29antarkpu:42_0: AnTs_42 tatra pratyakṣajñānakaraṇaṃ pratyakṣam / indriyārthasannikarṣajanyaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:42_1: pratyakṣam /tad dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ceti / tatra nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:42_2: nirvikalpakaṃ yathedaṃ kiṃcit / saparakārakaṃ jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ yathā ḍittho'yam
GSP29antarkpu:43_0: AnTs_43 pratyakṣajñānahetur indriyārthasannikarṣaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ / saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:43_2: cakṣuṣā ghaṭapratyakṣajanane saṃyogaḥ sannikarṣaḥ / ghaṭarūpapratyakṣajanane saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:43_3: sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpasya samavāyāt / rūpatvasāmānyapratyakṣe saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:43_4: sannikarṣaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃyukte ghaṭe rūpaṃ samavetaṃ tatra rūpatvasya samavāyāt / śrotreṇa
GSP29antarkpu:43_5: śabdasyākāśaguṇatvāt guṇaguṇinoś ca samavāyāt / śabdatvasākṣātkāre samavetasamavāyaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:43_6: sannikarṣaḥ śrotrasamavete śabde śabdatvasya samavāyāt / abhāvaparatyakṣe viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:44_0: bhṛtalam ity atra cakṣuḥsaṃyukte bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya viśeṣaṇatvāt / evaṃ snnikarṣaṣaṭkajanyaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:44_1: jñānaṃ pratyakṣam / tatkaraṇam indriyam / tasmād indriyaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇam iti siddham //
GSP29antarkpu:45_0: AnTs_44 anumitikaraṇam anumānam / parāmarśajanyaṃ jñānam anumitiḥ / vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:45_1: parāmarśaḥ / yathā vahnivyāpyadhūmavān ayaṃ parvata iti jñānaṃ parāmarśaḥ / taj janyaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:45_2: parvato vahnimān iti jñānam anumitiḥ / yatra yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir iti sāhacaryaniyamo
GSP29antarkpu:46_0: AnTs_45 anumānaṃ dvividhaṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ ca / tatra svārthaṃ svānumitihetuḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:46_1: tathā hi svayam eva bhūyo darśanena yatra dhūmas tatra agnir iti mahānasādau vyāptiṃ
GSP29antarkpu:46_2: gṛhītvā parvatasamīpaṃ gatas tadgate cāgnau sandihānaḥ parvate dhūmaṃ paśyan vyāptiṃ
GSP29antarkpu:46_3: smarati yatra dhūmas tatrāgnir iti / tadantaraṃ vahnivyāpyadhūmavān ayaṃ parvata
GSP29antarkpu:46_4: iti jñānam utpadyate / ayam eva liṅgaparāmarṣaṃ ity ucyate / tasmāt parvato vahnimān
GSP29antarkpu:46_5: iti jñānam anumitir utpadyate / tad etat svārthānumānam / yat tu svayaṃ dhūmād agnim
GSP29antarkpu:46_6: anumāya parapratipattyarthaṃ pañcāvayavavākyaṃ prayukte tat parārthānumānam / yathā
GSP29antarkpu:46_7: parvato vahnimān dhūmavattvāt / yo yo dhūmavān sa vahnimān yathā mahānasaḥ / tathā
GSP29antarkpu:46_8: cāyam / tasmāt tatheti / anena pratipāditāl lingāt paro'py agniṃ pratipadyate //
GSP29antarkpu:47_0: AnTs_46 pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamāni pañcāvayavaḥ / parvato vahnimān iti pratijñā /
GSP29antarkpu:47_1: dhūmavattvād iti hetuḥ / yo yo dhūmavān sa so'gnimān yathā mahānasa ity udāharaṇam /
GSP29antarkpu:47_2: tathā cāyam iti upanayaḥ / tasmāt tatheti nigamanam //
GSP29antarkpu:48: AnTs_47 svārthānumitiparārthānumityor liṅgaparāmarśa eva karaṇam / tasmāl liṅgaparāmarśā'numānam //
GSP29antarkpu:49_0: AnTs_48 liṅgaṃ trividham / anvayavyatireki kevalānvayi kevalavyatireki ceti / anvayena
GSP29antarkpu:49_1: vyatirekeṇa ca vyāptimad anvayavyatireki / yathā vahnau sādhye dhūmavattvam / yatra
GSP29antarkpu:49_2: dhūmas tatrāgnir yathā mahānasa ity anvayavyāptiḥ / yatra vahnir nāsti tatra dhūmo'pi
GSP29antarkpu:49_3: nāsti yathā mahāhrada iti vyatirekavyāptiḥ / anvayamātravyāptikaṃ kevalānvayi yathā
GSP29antarkpu:49_4: ghaṭo'bhidheyaḥ prameyatvāt paṭavat / atra prameyatvābhidhyatvayor vyatirekavyāptir
GSP29antarkpu:49_5: nāsti sarvasyāpi prameyatvād abhidheyatvāc ca / vyatirekamātravyāptikaṃ kevalavyatireki
GSP29antarkpu:49_6: yathā pṛthivī tarebhyo bhidyate gandhavattvāt / yad itarebhyo na bhidyate na tad
GSP29antarkpu:49_7: gandhavat / yathā jalam / na ceyaṃ tathā / tasmān na tatheti atra yad gandhavat tad
GSP29antarkpu:49_8: itarabhinnam ity anvayadṛṣṭanto nāsti pṛthivīmātrasya pakṣatvāt //
GSP29antarkpu:50: AnTs_49 saṃdigdhasādhyavān pakṣaḥ / yathā dhūmavattve hetau parvataḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:51: AnTs_50 niścitasādhyavān sapakṣaḥ / yathā tatraiva mahānasaḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:52: AnTs_51 niścitasādhyābhāvavān vipakṣaḥ / yathā tatraiva mahāhradaḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:54_1: tatra sādhyābhāvavadvṛttiḥ sādhāraṇo anaikāntikaḥ / yathā parvato vahnimān prameyatvād
GSP29antarkpu:54_2: iti prameyatvasya vahnyabhāvavati hrade vidyamānatvāt / sarvasapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛtto'sādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:54_3: yathā śabdo nityaḥ śabdatvād iti / śabdatvaṃ sarvebhyo nityebhyo'ntyebhyaś ca vyāvṛttaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:54_5: prameyatvād iti / atra sarvasyāpi pakṣatvād dṛṣṭānto nāsti //
GSP29antarkpu:55: AnTs_54 sādhyābhāvavyāpto hetur viruddhaḥ / yatra śabdo nityaḥ kṛtakatvād iti / kṛtakatvaṃ hi nityatvābhāvenānityatvena vyāptam //
GSP29antarkpu:56: AnTs_55 yasya sādhyabhāvasādhakaṃ hetvantaraṃ vidyate sa satpratipakṣaḥ / yathā śabdo nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti / śabdo'nityaḥ kāryatvād ghaṭavad iti //
GSP29antarkpu:57_0: AnTs_56 asiddhas trividhaḥ / āśrayāsiddhaḥ svarūpāsiddho vyāpyatvāsiddhaś ceti /
GSP29antarkpu:57_1: āśrayāsiddho yathā gaganāravindaṃ surabhy aravindatvāt sarojāravindavat / atra gaganāravindam
GSP29antarkpu:57_2: āśrayaḥ / sa ca nāsty eva / svarūpāsiddho yathā śabdo guṇaś cākṣuṣatvāt / atra cākṣuṣatvaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:57_3: śabde nāsti śabdasya śrāvaṇatvāt / sopādhiko vyāpyatvāsiddhaḥ / sādhyavyāpakatve
GSP29antarkpu:57_6: vahnimattvād ity atrārdrendhasaṃyoga upādhiḥ / tathā hi / yatra dhūmas tatrārdrendhnasaṃyoga
GSP29antarkpu:57_7: iti sādhyavyāpakatā / yatra vahnis tatrārdrendhanasaṃyogābhāvād iti sādhanāvyāpakatā /
GSP29antarkpu:58: sati sādhanāvyāpakatvād ardrendhanasaṃyoga upādhiḥ / sopādhikatvād vahnimattvaṃ vyāpyatvāsiddham //
GSP29antarkpu:59_0: AnTs_57 yasya sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ sa bādhitaḥ / yathā vahnir anuṣṇo
GSP29antarkpu:59_1: dravyatvād iti / atrānuṣṇatvaṃ sādhyaṃ tadabhāva uṣṇatvaṃ spārśanapratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti bādhitatvam //
GSP29antarkpu:60_0: AnTs_58 upamitikaraṇam upamānam / saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhajñānam upamitiḥ / tatkaraṇaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:60_1: sādṛśyajñānam / atideśavākyārthasmaraṇam avāntaravyāpāraḥ / tathā hi kaś cid gavayaśabdārtham
GSP29antarkpu:60_2: ajānan kutaś cid āraṇyakapuruṣād gosadṛśo gavaya iti śrutvā vanaṃ gato vākyārthaṃ
GSP29antarkpu:60_3: smaran gosadṛṣaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyati / tadanantaram asau gavayaśabdavācya ity upamitir utpadyte //
GSP29antarkpu:61: AnTs_59 āptavākyaṃ śabdaḥ / āptas tu yathārthavaktā / vākyaṃ padasamūhaḥ / yathā gām ānayeti / śaktaṃ padam / asmāt padād ayam artho boddhavya itīśvarasaṃketaḥ śaktiḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:62_0: AnTs_60 ākāṅkṣā yogyatā saṃnidhiś ca vākyārthajñānahetuḥ / padasya padāntaravyatirekaprayuktānvayānanubhāvakatvam
GSP29antarkpu:63_0: AnTs_61 ākāṅkṣādirahitaṃ vākyam apramāṇam / yathā gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastīti na pramāṇam
GSP29antarkpu:63_1: ākāṅkṣāvirahāt / agninā siñced iti na pramāṇaṃ yogyatāvirahāt / prahare prehare'sahoccāritāni
GSP29antarkpu:64: AnTs_62 vākyaṃ dvividham / vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ ca / vaidikam īśvaroktatvāt sarvam eva pramāṇam / laukikaṃ tv āptoktaṃ pramāṇam / anyad apramāṇam //
GSP29antarkpu:66_0: AnTs_64 ayathārthānubhavas trividhaḥ saṃśayaviparyayatarkabhedāt / ekasmin dharmini
GSP29antarkpu:66_1: viruddhanānādharmavaiśiṣṭyāvagāhi jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ / yathā sthāṇur vā purṣo veti /
GSP29antarkpu:66_2: mithyājñānaṃ viparyayaḥ / yathā śuktāv idaṃ rajatam iti / vyāpyāropeṇa vyāpakāropas
GSP29antarkpu:66_3: tarkaḥ yathā yadi vahnir na syāt tarhi dhūmo'pi na syād iti //
GSP29antarkpu:67: AnTs_65 smṛtir api dvividhā / yathārthāyathārthā ca pramājanyā yathārthā / apramājanyāyathārthā //
GSP29antarkpu:76: AnTs_74 buddhīcchāprayatnā dvividhāḥ / nityā anityāś ca / nityā īśvarasya / anityā jīvasya //
GSP29antarkpu:77_0: AnTs_75 saṃskāras trividhaḥ / vego bhāvanā sthitisthāpakaś ceti / vegaḥ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayamanovṛttiḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:77_1: anubhavajanyā smṛtihetur bhāvanātmamātravṛttiḥ / anyathā kṛtasya punas tadavasthāpādakaḥ
GSP29antarkpu:78_0: AnTs_76 calanātmakaṃ karma / ūrdhvadeśasaṃyogahetur utkṣepaṇam / adhodeśasaṃyogahetur
GSP29antarkpu:79: AnTs_77 nityam ekam anekānugataṃ sāmānyam / dravyaguṇakarmavṛtti / tad dvividhaṃ parāparabhedāt / paraṃ sattā / aparaṃ dravyatvādiḥ //
GSP29antarkpu:81_0: AnTs_79 nityasaṃbandhaḥ samavāyaḥ / ayutasiddhavṛttiḥ / yayor dvayor madhya ekam
GSP29antarkpu:81_1: avinaśyadaparāśritam evāvatiṣṭate tāv ayutasiddau / yathāvayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau
GSP29antarkpu:82_0: AnTs_80 anādiḥ sāntaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ / utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ kāryasya / sādir anantaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ /
GSP29antarkpu:83: AnTs_81 sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ yathāyatham ukteṣv antarbhāvāt saptaiva padārthā iti siddham //
